au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends Object
    A wrapper class which takes a Model and a ShaderProgram, then performs Vertex Array Object setup in order to allow easy drawing of the Model via the ShaderProgram.
    Version:
    0.5 - 12/01/2016

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(Model model,
              ShaderProgram shaderProgram)
        Constructor.

        Models may have any number of vertices and vertex normals.

        Shader programs should have the following uniforms ([OPTIONAL] uniforms are just that - optional):

        • mat4 projectionMatrix
        • mat4 viewMatrixMatrix
        • mat4 modelMatrix
        • mat3 normalMatrix [OPTIONAL]
        Shader programs must also have the following per-vertex attributes:
        • vec3 vertexLocation
        • vec3 vertexNormal [OPTIONAL]
        Parameters:
        model - The model associated with this entity.
        shaderProgram - The shader program used to draw this model.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(Mat4f projectionMatrix,
                 Mat4f viewMatrix,
                 Mat4f modelMatrix,
                 Mat3f normalMatrix,
                 int drawMode)
        Draw this entity's model using it's shader program.

        Specify NULL for the normal matrix if the model associated with this entity does not contain vertex normals.

        Valid draw modes (as per the LWJGL3 GL11 class) are: GL_POINTS, GL_LINES, GL_LINE_LOOP, GL_LINE_STRIP, GL_TRIANGLES, GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, GL_TRIANGLE_FAN, GL_QUADS, GL_QUAD_STRIP, and GL_POLYGON.

        Parameters:
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix.
        viewMatrix - The view matrix.
        modelMatrix - The model matrix.
        normalMatrix - The normal matrix.
        drawMode - The draw mode to use (GL_POINTS etc).

      • draw

        public void draw(Mat4f projectionMatrix,
                 Mat4f viewMatrix,
                 Mat4f modelMatrix,
                 int drawMode)
        Utility method to draw our entity where the model does not contain vertex normals.
        Parameters:
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix.
        viewMatrix - The view matrix.
        modelMatrix - The model matrix.
        drawMode - The draw mode.

      • modelHasNormals

        public boolean modelHasNormals()
        Return whether or not the model attached to this entity has normals.
        Returns:
        whether or not the model attached to this entity has normals.

      • updateModel

        public void updateModel(Model model)
        Update the model attached to this entity to be the provided model.

        The model provided is assigned by reference.

        Parameters:
        model - The model to associate with this entity.

      • updateShaderProgram

        public void updateShaderProgram(ShaderProgram shaderProgram)
        Update the shader program attached to this entity to be the provided shader program.

        The shader program provided is assigned by reference.

        Parameters:
        shaderProgram - The shaderProgram to associate with this entity.
